## Checklist

Before submitting, please confirm:

- [ ] I have tested this agent and it works
- [ ] I followed the agent schema in `types/agent.ts`
- [ ] I used a unique `id` (checked existing agents)
- [ ] I included clear installation instructions
- [ ] I properly attributed the original author (if applicable)
- [ ] I added 2-5 relevant tags
- [ ] I included today's date in `createdAt` field
- [ ] I added this agent to the correct file (`agents/[tool].ts`)
- [ ] The build passes (`npm run build` if tested locally)
